REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f3904 reute r f BC-DOSKOCIL-<DOSK.O>-REP 06-18 0043

TEXT.TITLE: DOSKOCIL <DOSK.O> REPURCHASES SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Doskocil Cos Inc said it has repurchased 310,000 of its common shares, or about five pct, for undisclosed terms and its board has authorized the further repurchase of another 200,000 shares. Reuter
